mapper.insert: insert into user_info(username, password, identity_number, balance,enable) values (#{username},#{password},#{identityNumber},#{balance},#{enable})
mapper.select: select count(*) from user_info where username = #{username} or identity_number = #{identityNumber}

select user_info.id, user_info.username, user_info.password, user_info.identity_number, user_info.enable, permission.value from user_info left join user_role on user_info.id = user_role.user_id left join role on user_role.role_id = role.id left join role_permission on role.id = role_permission.role_id left join permission on role_permission.permission_id = permission.id where user_info.identity_number= #{identityNumber}
select count(*) from user_info where username = #{username}
